tool_description: Get songs, playlist & album in MP3 from Amazon Music.
name: Amazon Music MP3
title: Amazon Music MP3

api_list.name: Am Convert Points
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-music-mp3.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-music-mp3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-music-mp3.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-music-mp3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
